statements: DELETE FROM FinancialPerformanceForecast WHERE Revenue > 10000 AND Expenses < 5000;
DELETE FROM financial_statements WHERE company_name = 'Company A';
DELETE FROM cash_flows WHERE company_name = 'Company B';
DELETE FROM financial_statements WHERE company_name = 'Apple Inc';
DELETE FROM cash_flows WHERE amount > 1000 AND category = 'Investments';
DELETE FROM financial_statements WHERE statement_type = 'Balance Sheet' AND statement_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM cash_flows WHERE company_id = 101 AND year = 2020
